alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Morgan (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 8:20PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Morgan and southeastern Lawrence Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 820 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Decatur to 7 miles southwest of Trinity to near Moulton. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Decatur, Hartselle, Moulton, Priceville, Trinity, Falkville, Somerville, Eva, Speake and Caddo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central and northwestern Alabama.
